Directions: In a food processor, combine the orange, raisins and pecans. Cover and process until mixture is finely chopped; set aside. In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Beat in eggs and vanilla; mix well. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk. Stir in orange mixture. Pour into a greased and floured 1-in. flouted tube pan. Bake at 325 degrees F for 45-55 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes; invert onto a wire rack.
In a small bowl, combine glaze ingredients until smooth; brush over warm cake. Cool completely before serving.
Ingredients: 1 large navel orange, cut into 8 wedges
